extendedInfo.description: About Smart SWF Player:It is a tool application to play flash file(.swf) stored locally on the device (including sd-card).with it,to play and run swf files is now possible and easy.If you like flash animations,games,apps you will need it!Key features:âCan play flash animationsâCan play flash gamesâCan play flash apps âSupport play controlâSupport landscape full-screen modeâSupport portrait full-screen modeâVery small program sizeInstallation:You need to install Adobe Flash Player Plugin before using this player.Popular Installed Device:LG Optimus 2XLG RevolutionHTC DesireHTC IncredibleHTC InspireHTC ThunderBoltHTC SensationHTC Evo 4GHTC DragonMoto Droid XMoto Droid X2Moto MilestoneMoto DefyMoto AtrixSamsung EpicSamsung Galaxy TabSamsung Galaxy S2Sony Ericsson XperiaNexus SSamsung Epic 4GMoto XT800Moto XoomAcer LiquidAcer StreamDell VenueSHARP IS03/05 SHARP SH-12CBug Report:If you have any request or you want to notify a bug, contact me using e-mail(andy.bian.developer@gmail.com). #FAQQ - Why not work?A - Please check do you install adobe flash player plugin after that kill smart flash player task and restart it.Q - How to install adobe flash player plugin?A - You can download adobe flash player plugin on android market (https://market.android.com/details?id=com.adobe.flashplayer). But not all android2.2 device can meet the minimum hardware requirements for adobe flash player plugin . Good Luck !Q - What is SWF file?A - SWF is one of the most popular Flash container formats and it's used for most of the animated content and video clips on today's websites.Q - How to use?A - You can download flash files(.swf) from internet and copy to sd-card. Play them with this tool.Q - Why does need Internet and Phone state permissions?A - The Internet and Phone state permissions are only used to show ads.The paid version is on sale right now. It's called "Smart SWF Player Pro" Thank you very much for your support!#KWFlash,Flash Player,Adobe Flash File Player,SWF File Player,Flash Game Player,Flash Online Game Player

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This program is great for two reasons.  One, it allows me to play my SWF games and is flawless. Two,  and most important it allowed me to put on adobe flash player on my system. Previously, my tablet wouldn\'t allow flash. But when this program prompted me that I need flash I downloaded it. Now my tablet is complete thanks to this gem.
reviews.author: James Hrehowsik

reviews.title: very nice
reviews.comment: running on the Samsung tab android 4.1.1. it probably works because I downloaded Adobe flash player 11.1 for android 4.0, this I got from the Adobe archives. Apparently Adobe no longer supports the android platform so the 11.1 player will probably never be upgraded. Anyways this app does a good job so far even with the older version of flash. If you need Adobe flash player try getting it from Adobe archives not from anywhere else, and then get this app if you have SWF videos to play.
reviews.author: Victor P

reviews.title: Great Help
reviews.comment: This helped me to be able to download flash. It gave me sourses to d-load flash and it works like a charm!! Thanks,!!!!! \342\231\245\342\231\245\342\231\245
reviews.author: Yuma Ryoshi

reviews.title: doesnt work on SS G Tab2
reviews.comment: am using as instructed and it wont work on os4.1.1 android tab2. i use a SF webcam that allows users to actually move and zoom a webcam to see boats racing in the bay. flash is required and of course webcam wont display/work. tried it several times and would not display also. would like to know if anyone else with a SS galaxy TAB2 ius able to use this successfully. thanks

reviews.title: Works fine on Samsung Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: I read the comment from s3 and got worried it wouldn\'t work but it works great! I was highly disappointed when Adobe took their flash player away but now I have one just as good

reviews.title: Galaxy S3 didn\'t work
reviews.comment: Android 4.1.1 rooted stock rom. Doesn\'t work without adobe flash and it says its not compatible with device.
reviews.author: Terrence McNally

reviews.title: Awesome for streaming videos
reviews.comment: Got this so I could stream from anime sites and such; works great, streams content very well and has good means of navigating forward and backward through the video.  Haven\'t tried it on 4g or 3g yet, but is awesome with a wifi connection. No ads as far as I can tell,  this is definitely an app worth checking out
reviews.author: Amber Risser

reviews.title: Find the Real Flash Player that you want
reviews.comment: I have been looking for days to find out why my brand new Nexus 7 cannot install Adobe Flash Player, just to find that adobe only lets it install on older devices that originally had flash player and has made it unavailable to something new. So I can\'t view websites done in flash, no flash video.games, no amazon instant video.  Supposedly adobe air can fix the issue but seemed to do nothing to help.  Want the real Adobe Flash Player? If yes like me, find it at APK4(dot)us for the latest version. Amazon instant videos won\'t have sound but so far all other features of Flash seem to be working normally.  Please spread the word so people are not searching for days on how to pull the flash.apk file from their old phones. AGAIN I Have a Google Nexus 7 and an old Motorola Atrix.
reviews.author: Neil Allgood

reviews.title: Pretty good but not perfect yet
reviews.comment: Good app but needs more I cannot navigate through videos as I can only rewind if I select a place to start with the time bar it just jumps back to the beginning or where it was. When I exit the app it will keep playing which I like because I have some swf audiobooks but if I mess around with the phone and open or close some apps it will turn off release an update please

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Very good app, does just what I want it to with one exception, it double taps when I tap too fast, tho this might be an android issue. Also all you people whining about it not working, read the description! It clearly states adobe flash player is required, of course it is! Just install it from play store, unless you are running 4.0 and up, in which case Google \"android 4.0 flash player\" and install. Some of you just need to read instructions better!
reviews.author: Julie Maxted

reviews.comment: Its working with Google Phone. I just tested today        .
